definition: the trait of lacking restraint or control, to stop maintaining or insisting on
details:
noun
- the trait of lacking restraint or control
= synonyms: wantonness
- a feeling of extreme emotional intensity
= synonyms: wildness
verb
- to stop maintaining or insisting on
= example: to stop maintaining or insisting on
= synonyms: give up
- to leave someone who needs or counts on you
= example: to leave someone who needs or counts on you
= synonyms: desolate
- to leave behind empty
= example: to leave behind empty
= synonyms: empty
- to give up with the intent of never claiming again
= example: to give up with the intent of never claiming again
= synonyms: give up
